description:
After Creating an active recurring deposit account for a client if the same ID is searched through Global search then the Recurring deposit account is displaying with entity Savings, then by clicking on that the account page will get displayed and not able to perform any action in that page.

For screenshots refer the link:
name: Mifos X Web App - A Global Search Of "Recurring Deposit Account" Gets Displays And Is Unable To Perform Any Further Actions
